Class StringExtensions

Namespace
Innovt.Core.Utilities
Assembly
Innovt.Core.dll

Provides a collection of extension methods for string manipulation and validation.

ApplyQuotes(string)

Encloses a string in double quotes if it contains spaces.

public static string ApplyQuotes(this string value)

Parameters

value string

The string to enclose in double quotes.

Returns

string

The original string if it does not contain spaces; otherwise, the string enclosed in double quotes.

Returns

Returns

str string

The string to check.

defaultValue string

Returns

string
